title: 2 bed , 2 bath apartment for rent
posting_body: 2-bed and 2-bathroom apartments for rent (the cheapest in Las Vegas)
The building has 4 units (2 bed, 2 bath), each rent for only $600 per month
Tenants are paying very cheap rent per month (some are paying only $550 per month)
Try to offer the landlord $700 per month and he will find you a unit in his building…
Sorry I don’t have his information
but I know he is very sick these days.
Of course tenants will not help you otherwise they have to move out... try to be smart in order to get the landlord information
A landlord can easily ask any tenants to move out with a one month notes
